scripts.install: if [ -d './Server' ] ; then cd Server && npm i ; cd .. ; fi && cd Client && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix Client" "npm run dev --prefix Server"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix Server && npm run build --prefix Client
scripts.migrate: cd Server && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config src/config/sequelize.cjs --migrations-path src/migrations --models-path src/models --seeders-path src/seeders
scripts.migrate:undo: cd Server && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --config src/config/sequelize.cjs
scripts.migrate:reset: cd Server && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --config src/config/sequelize.cjs && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config src/config/sequelize.cjs
scripts.seed: cd Server && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config src/config/sequelize.cjs --seeders-path src/seeders
scripts.seed:undo: cd Server && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --config src/config/sequelize.cjs --seeders-path src/seeders
